thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Wells Fargo Expects Fed Asset Cap to Continue Into Early 2019

author: Emily Glazer
title: Wells Fargo Expects Fed Asset Cap to Continue Into Early 2019

organizations.name: wells fargo expects fed asset cap

text:
Wells Fargo Chief Executive Timothy Sloan said the bank’s asset cap imposed by the Federal Reserve will continue into the first part of 2019. Mr. Sloan, speaking at Wells Fargo’s investor day presentation Thursday, said the bank needs time to address and incorporate feedback from the Fed.
The Fed, which cited “widespread consumer abuses” at Wells Fargo, imposed the asset cap in an unprecedented enforcement action in February. Wells Fargo is barred from growing past the $1.95 trillion in assets it had at the end of 2017 unless... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
